name: Tonkotsu ramen delizioso
desc: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The springy noodles have absorbed the essence of the soup, and the accoutrements have added all manner of variation to the mouthfeel. The soup has preserved the strong fragrance of the bones used to make it, yet goes down gently without that greasy feeling. Before you know it, the bowl's all gone, and you've still got room for more.

customize.name: Ricetta: tonkotsu ramen
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tonkotsu Ramen.

customize.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Farina
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Germoglio di bamb√π
customize.desc: A fresh young bamboo shoot, straight out of the ground. It is a delicious cooking ingredient with an exotic aroma, found exclusively in bamboo-growing regions.

customize.name: Uovo d'uccello
customize.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

customize.name: Tonkotsu ramen
customize.desc: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The meat, prepared at low temperature, is laid over the noodles. Salty, fragrant, delicious soup seeps into each strand. A single bowl of these is guaranteed to restore any tired soul.

customize.name: Tonkotsu ramen sospetto
customize.desc: A steaming-hot noodle dish. The noodles were all but forgotten amid the hubbub of preparing the accoutrements, leading to it almost turning into a paste and becoming one with the soup. Oh well, at least you can drink the whole lot to salvage it a bit.

value.text: Restores 34% of Max HP and an additional 1,900 HP to the selected character.
